  Validate that a string represents a valid integer.

# function: integer

Returns true when the input string is a valid integer (optional leading + or -).

## Example Usage

```terraform
locals {
  values = ["0", "-42", "+7", "3.14"]
}

output "integer_example" {
  value = [
    for v in local.values : {
      value = v
      valid = provider::validatefx::integer(v)
    }
  ]
}
```

## Signature

<!-- signature generated by tfplugindocs -->
```text
integer(value string) bool
```

## Arguments

<!-- arguments generated by tfplugindocs -->
1. `value` (String, Nullable) String value to validate.
